name: Roguelike Fishing! LD41
description: For the Ludum Dare 41 theme I mixed a fishing game, with a roguelike/survival-horror. The result is a fun mix of fishing, treasure hunting, and the occasional run-in with Eldritch Horrors! Have fun fishing, leveling up, and finding treasure! Just make sure to avoid any eldritch horrors, old gods, or giant tentacles in any form.
